text: Motion
Motion
Motion

This weekend, Kogane will be on location, Mamimi will be in studio
recording, Yuika will be on radio, and Kiriko will be in a magazine──
Sakuya will be in a drama meeting.
Ah

Sorry,
It looks like we won't all be together for a while again...
It's okay.

──No, I didn't phrase that correctly.
Originally, the cause of concern was me.
Sakuya──
I want you to feel at ease, Producer.

I feel apologetic for causing you worry.
That hasn't changed even now──
I understand it's not all bad.

I know that everyone's concern for me──
I should accept it gratefully.
──I see.
Ah!
──...And also, even if we're apart, we're still one──
And everyone cherishing L'Antica too.

It might sound like I've just realized it now,
even though I should have known.
──...I won't say that.

If Sakuya has reached this conclusion through her own efforts,
through everyone's efforts──then now is the time for it.
